website_summaries.verdict: With smooth gliding action and a solid, one-piece upper track, this kit contains fewer pieces than others. Furthermore, the price may be a bit higher than expected.
pros: Works well with out-of-level wall frames
Track is one solid piece, not two segments
cons: Holes are drilled to standard 16 inches on center, but mfr
Modification may be required before installation

customer_reviews.title: BARN DOORS MADE EASY!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I installed our first sliding barn door this past Saturday. The instructions were in the box and ALL the hardware, bolts, nuts, stoppers were included. It takes a couple of hours to hang when it's your first-ever! We used our existing bedroom door as it is the original to our circa 1950 farmhouse - we took the knobs off and will cover the holes with brass rounds (looking for them now). Hanging the door this way opens up our very small bedroom and gives more clearing to the walkway area. WE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: HOPE50

customer_reviews.title: American made, American tough
customer_reviews.text: Ultra durable, very strong black powder coat. Extremely smooth rollers. Yep it's not your cheapest option but buying a super high quality peice made in America makes all the difference. I got the handle at Costco, also made in America. I'm really very happy with this hardware. Please take my advice, buy American. You wiling be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Rigel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product and Even Better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised! Thinking I could save time I went to Home Depot to try to get a kit and do it myself, but their product was sub-par and they didn't know anything about it when I needed help. I returned it and bought this one...great decision!!! The quality of these is amazing and when I called to get some help with hanging my door, they were extremely knowledgeable and knew exactly what to tell me. I will definitely go back to them when I add more of these in my house!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wilde

customer_reviews.title: and a pretty nice one at that
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it's supposed to be, and a pretty nice one at that. I have no complaints at all. The track was straight and all the holes were drilled perfectly. I was able to use all but one hole due to not having a stud to anchor the lag bolt to. My door only weight about 60 lbs or so. The rollers are sturdy and extremely quiet. Me and my wife (who is the one that wanted a barn door in her kitchen) and very pleased with the track. I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: love it! Track was one solid piece
customer_reviews.text: Priced right, love it! Track was one solid piece, not 2 pieces you put together like many other brands. Thick metal, diy installation took 2 tries. It doesn't sit very far off of wall so it's best to mount a 8 foot board to the wall, then mount the track to the board. Otherwise, the door hits door casing and won't slide right.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Had to email for hanging instructions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Had to email for hanging instructions. Seller responded immediately with instructions
customer_reviews.author: NMZ

customer_reviews.title: but it feels like a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Door slides very smoothly and quietly. Product is exactly as pictured. We have not had it for very long, but it feels like a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great hardware. Final installation looks beautiful. Only issue were that the pre drilled holes did not matchup with the studs in our wall and we ended up having to drill even more holes in the track.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My plan was to purchase this based on reviews and the quality...just ended up that the standard set-up from Amazon fit the bill versus ordering from your site. I will say, the barn door rail kit is exceptional. The powder coating on the parts is great and the installation was a breeze. If I were going to do this again...no doubt I would purchase an Artisan product! Still looking for the "right" handles for this but overall...I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to install. We added a barn door to an open entryway from our Master bedroom to the on suite
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Zawisza

customer_reviews.title: Paint peeling off.
customer_reviews.text: The the paint is peeling off the roller brackets, Appears to be lots of rust under the black paint. Disappointing I will sand and repaint with an undercoat and rustoleum.
customer_reviews.author: WesW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A 5 star for this barn door hardware. Heavy metal and bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paint chipping off and rust underneath
customer_reviews.text: Good product and would recommend if painted better. The black coated paint was not applied well to the strap hangers. One arrived chipped, rust is visible and clearly under the paint. I only expect it to get worse. The other hanger has bubbles in the paint, showing obvious signs that the paint has not bonded to the metal. I expect that to start flaking off soon. I haven't even used the product, just pulled them out of packaging. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a very quiet rolling unit (which I love) & it looks very nice on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my home for a very large & very heavy barn door. It is a very quiet rolling unit (which I love) & it looks very nice on the wall. Heavy duty hardware for a heavy duty door. Have had many nice compliments about this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great but rusty
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome and we’ve gotten so many compliments. We’ve used it to hold a mirror on a sliding door on our medicine cabinet. It wasn’t fully painted black, though, and is rusting quickly. We will need to paint it the rest of the way ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were terrible. To install properly you need a header that ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked but boy way it a pain to install. I had to modify multiple components to make it fit and, the instructions were terrible. To install properly you need a header that extends past the door, way past the door, if you dont have this you will be screwing those 1/2' fasteners into nothing. Good luck trying to find a wall anchor for those giant beast (there isn't one).
customer_reviews.author: Joe Doe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of time for me to open the package. I waited until the door I chose was ready to hang. You need to do that, too. The hardware is everything you'd want it to be and the quality and price are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford E. Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but even with Amazon giving the best deal
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but even with Amazon giving the best deal, this item is way over priced for a strap of steel, a few bolts, and 2 plastic wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We loved the ease of installation when we put the barn ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved the ease of installation when we put the barn door in however, we noticed that the rollers were different. one was nylon or plastic and the other one was metal. The bolts that came with the hardware were not long enough and we had to purchase longer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Made in America top quality
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect style for my space. I bought this one because it was made in America and I want to support that. There were no disappointments.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lardinais

customer_reviews.title: Hole alignment off
customer_reviews.text: The look is great and it was just what I wanted. Only problem was with the holes in the roller attachment to the door. One would assume them to be identical and the are not. The holes are off by a quarter of an inch. After the door was installed, we found this out. So had to remove the door and adjust. Luckily, I have a talented carpenter.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Cook

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Superior Quality American Made!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely well made. The durability and simple lines are just beautiful! Being American made, I cannot say enough about how superior these are compared to other sliding barn door kits we've seen at the local stores and online that are manufactured overseas. It is a great investment and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Barn Doors
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the barn doors. We used them betwee the master bath and master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: Good value overall
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I am really pleased by the final outcome. However I did not like the instructions for the assembly. Everything was in metric with decimal equivalents, no fractions. Illustrations only with no verbiage at all. I had to make adjustments on mine because my door was thicker than the hardware would allow. Finding the metric bolts I needed was difficult and even then I had to countersink the heads in the back of the door. Paint was excellent on all and the door is very quiet and easy to roll. Putting together a second one would be a lot easier now that I have done one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Knuth

customer_reviews.title: Went together fine! Over all great product
customer_reviews.text: Went together fine! Over all great product ! Also Bought some door track guides to help stabilize the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Hardware!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is well built hardware! I was very picky when I chose which barn door hardware to buy and I am glad I did. This hardware is holding a heavy barn door with a 65" TV attached to it and I have no doubts that it can support the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pasko

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect. We build our own barn door and this ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. We build our own barn door and this fit perfectly. The customer service from Artisan Hardware was beyond what I expected. Highly recommend them for their quality and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lauracj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: I built a custom barn door to go up in the garage and this worked out great! The door is several hundred pounds and this thing slides it like there's nothing there.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: After agonizing what to choose, I decided on this hardware for my bathroom slider door. It is very, very sturdy and looks great! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Toni K Tunmer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware, parts will be missing
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were confusing. Missed several parts in the package, which had to buy at home depot as I couldn't wait till a new shipment came thru, due to the urgency to install the door. Don't recommend. Once all parts were completed, the door looked amazing. Giving 2 stars because I feel that we had to jump thru last minute hoops to get this installed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This rail worked perfectly on our handmade barn door. I was skeptical to buy because of the cheap price, but it looks and works very well. I definitely recommend and will buy again if I can find somewhere else to put a barn door!
customer_reviews.author: Kapaxmom

customer_reviews.title: Sliding Door Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Great product, holding up very well and looks good too !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Take care and be precise while installing and you will have no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Can be a little tricky to install, but careful planning will result in a smooth rolling door. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Plumbob

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my hardware
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my hardware! I ordered this particular hardware because of the weight load it supports. I knew my door would be heavy and it's great! The only thing that i wasn't overly happy about was the pre-drilled holes. Most walls are built with studs 16'' apart, but mine are 18''. I had to drill extra holes, so for me, it would've made more sense to drill them myself. Make sure you know your stud separation, and you should be good to go! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful iron handles...would not go wrong if you ordered...GREAT price!
customer_reviews.author: cindy arrendale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with how great this looks and works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: K.lovell

customer_reviews.title: The track has been perfect. It slides like butter and looks great in ...
customer_reviews.text: The track has been perfect. It slides like butter and looks great in our barn door. Our friends liked it so much they bought this one for their door.
customer_reviews.author: Bentfam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very strong and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install (just make sure you're hitting studs). Had to drill new holes in the rail to make sure I was hitting studs with every lag bolt. This hardware kit is designed well and very sturdy holding our 50 lb. 8'x4' cedar barn door!
customer_reviews.author: TayMac

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this hardware. Rolls extremely smooth and quiet. Very solid in structure. Would recommend. Also, US company so that's always a plus
customer_reviews.author: Dm4re

customer_reviews.title: Good Shipping. Works Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Solid Product : Good Shipping. Works Beautifully. The only issue may be Lining up the pre drilled holes with your studs. If you are building a wall, during Frame stage build a solid header above the opening and to both sides and it will make life easy for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware for barn door.
customer_reviews.text: Went up smoothly. Looks GREAT! Heavy duty, but doesn't look clunky
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Over all it's a really good kit for the money and would probably do it ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 but the lack of a non drilled option is a bummer, unless you are extremely lucky or just don't care the holes won't line up with your studs. Your door opening will typically mess with the spacing, I was as careful as I could be and actually shortened the track anyway but still had to drill and extra hole. I also broke a lag bolt off in the wall, not NW fault but look at your lags carefully... Over all it's a really good kit for the money and would probably do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, quality set of barn door hardware. Easy to assemble and it looks fantastic. I highly recommend this if you are looking for a barn door kit.

customer_reviews.text: Got this for a custom barn door I made for a Client. Waiting to hang it still but looks beautiful and quality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made hardware, exactly as described. Arrived on time, well packaged and no damage.

customer_reviews.title: Love the stops on it on both ends
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a bathroom in my basement...it worked perfectly. No hitches. Love the stops on it on both ends. Very nice heavy duty product.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the hardware
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the hardware; exceeded my expectations by far! Do not hesitate to purchase this American Made product. Instructions were very clear and easy to use. The hardware is of high quality. No disappointment here.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The hardware looks beautiful with my solid barn doors.

customer_reviews.text: Very well made, easy to install and I love how quiet the wheels are when they roll on the track. Thanks for quick shipping! Would definitely recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Brought the barn door in the house!
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find on these at time of purchase. The directions weren't much but easy enough to figure out. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Best price by far anywhere. Arrived quicker than expected...highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: Love this product, works perfectly! This is one of the neatest products I have had installed at our house. Used outside under our newly underpinned porch. Door slides with almost no effort, plus a real spacesaver.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price and worked great for our old barn door

customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed for the project. Great quality and delivery!

customer_reviews.title: this slider looks very nice, it works perfect
customer_reviews.text: this slider looks very nice, it works perfect, i can pull the door aside on nice days without putting a door stop,,makes my goats house look great against the white paint

customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what we were looking for and as described. Unfortunately you need to purchase some additional screws to install and the written instructions leave something to be desired. Overall a good solid buy, and would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best it could be
customer_reviews.text: This is the best it could be. We have a 200 pound recycled wood door, its smooth as silk. It's made in the USA!!

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: NW Artisan Hardware is putting out a great product for a great price. I ordered two of these tracks to put over top of windows in my church and ordered extra hangers to create shutters on either side that could come together as blackout doors - they look incredible. Simple, elegant, rustic and priced right. Don't hesitate to buy these!

customer_reviews.title: strong black hardware are the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my new barn door constructed from a 5 by 8 sheet of furniture grade plywood. Artist designed and painted picture. Simple, strong black hardware are the perfect fit!

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were not written at all and the measurements in ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not written at all and the measurements in mm, The product seems tobe reasonably well built, but a little more construction details would help.

customer_reviews.text: I built a door that is just under 2 inches thick. The product says it works for doors up to 2 inches thick. YOU WILL NEED TO BUY YOUR OWN LAG BOLTS for it to work with anything over 1.75 inches thick.

product_meta.title: USA Made 8 ft Sliding Wood Barn Door Hardware Kit Artisan Hardware Classic Barndoor System with 8ft Track (Black)
product_meta.description: In response to a high customer demand, we added an 8ft Classic style hardware option to our stocked inventory. We are now able to offer the product at a discounted price and ship within 24 hours (business days) of purchasing the product. Because we have stocked and boxed the product, there are not customizable options in terms of track length and finishes, however we selected the most popular Classic hardware to appeal to the widest array of customers possible. The hardware ships via UPS ground within 24 hours of purchase at NO additional cost. -Black Finish -8ft Pre-Drilled Track -2 Classic Hangers with Nylon Wheels -Spacers and Lag Bolts -2 Stops -1 Bottom Guide Barn Door Hardware is becoming increasingly popular as both a stylistic alternative to a swinging door and space saving option in places with limited swing availability. Artisan Hardware has been manufacturing and sourcing the highest quality products for over 5 years.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES EASY TO UNDERSTAND INSTRUCTIONS: We Also have a DIY How To Video on YouTube "Barn Door Hardware Installation and How-To | Artisan Hardware". The Track is Pre-Driller 16" on center mounting. We provide a well educated customer service team to help with any questions.
INDUSTRIAL STYLE: Add a modern, rustic, or industrial look to any space on the Interior or Exterior of your home, office, cabin or shed with this sliding barn door hardware kits

ULTRA DURABLE STRENGTH: Can support doors up to 400 lbs comfortably with Nylon Bearing wheel for Ultra Quiet Smooth Roll. Manufactured in the USA with UNMATCHED QUALITY and CUSTOMER SERVICE Here in Kaysville, Utah.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: 100% Money Back Guarantee if your not satisfied with this product. We now use the Highest Quality Powder Coat Available.
SOLID ONCE PIECE 8FT TRACK: One full 96" rail included. Others will send you two separate 4 foot tracks(rails), which is not as easy to install or structurally as strong with a seam.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars164 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
